entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -38.6°C
